thread.title: Ground News - ‘Blowtorch’ heat roasts southern US states as powerful El Nino strikes
thread.title_full: Ground News - ‘Blowtorch’ heat roasts southern US states as powerful El Nino strikes

author: gbnews.com
title: Ground News - ‘Blowtorch’ heat roasts southern US states as powerful El Nino strikes
text:
Summary by gbnews.com America will become a nation divided with a crippling ice storm gripping the north as ‘blowtorch’ heat roasts the south.A tropical plume surging in from Mexico ahead of the weekend will push temperatures in parts into the mid-70Fs.However, warm moisture hitting cold air from Canada will trigger further storms, experts warn.In the firing line for the highest temperatures, forecast into the New Year, are south-eastern and southwestern states.Jim D… Share menu More
